channel.title: [pi] player noclipping when attacking another player
channel.description:
hey guys, problem: i have been trying for a while to find out how to stop players no clipping through walls, fences & houses when they click 'attack player' on the other person behind the house, wall. i went through alot of files in the source trying to find how to do this & search a number of key words but no result.
example: if i was in wildy not attacking anyone and i clicked over the other side of the fence, it would go around it. but if 'bob' is on the other side of the fence and i click attack bob i will go right through the fence other worlds he doesn't stop for nothing.
please help

item.title: [pi] player noclipping when attacking another player
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

hey guys,
problem: i have been trying for a while to find out how to stop players no clipping through walls, fences & houses when they click ‘attack player’ on the other person behind the house, wall.
i went through alot of files in the source trying to find how to do this & search a number of key words but no result.

example: if i was in wildy not attacking anyone and i clicked over the other side of the fence, it would go around it.
but if ‘bob’ is on the other side of the fence and i click attack bob i will go right through the fence
other worlds he doesn’t stop for nothing.

please help
